p:
Similarly to the Hancioglus model, the smallest organization
O 1
B o
is an organization with immune response but without infection ( C,
V f
). There is only one further organization that contains only one more species than
O 1
B o
, namely uninfected cells U. This organization we already found in three of the previous models. However, for the first time, there is no bigger organization in this model. Thus, virus infection is necessarily transient.
